data.actual_result: Won't show any unless you hit to open Camera Roll
data.expected_result: Should show all pictures and download them if you try to share it
data.short_description: Having all of your pictures saved on iCloud using the Optimize iPhone Storage option will make it so it won't appear in recent images in the clipboard
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure all of your pictures are on the iCloud rather than downloaded in your phone - Make sure none of them are downloaded and click clipboard and see the pictures
